testcase.name: Zoho Application Login Comprehensive Tests › 1. Admin Login, Dashboard Navigation and Logout Flow
testcase.system-out: ✅ Loaded stored credentials for login testing Manager Email: manager17587917936658031@zoho.com Admin Email: admin17587918044407267@zoho.com 🔑 STEP 1: Admin Login, Dashboard Navigation and Logout Flow Logging in as Admin... ✅ Admin login successful Testing admin dashboard navigation... ✅ Navigated to Dashboard page ✅ Navigated to Employees page ✅ Navigated to Positions page ✅ Navigated to Matching page ✅ Admin dashboard navigation completed Logging out as Admin... ⚠️ Logout element not found, manually navigating to login

testcase.name: Zoho Application Login Comprehensive Tests › 2. Manager Login, Dashboard Navigation and Logout Flow
testcase.system-out: 🔑 STEP 2: Manager Login, Dashboard Navigation and Logout Flow Logging in as Manager... ✅ Manager login successful Testing manager dashboard navigation... ✅ Navigated to Dashboard page ✅ Navigated to Employees page ✅ Navigated to Positions page ✅ Navigated to Matching page ✅ Manager dashboard navigation completed Logging out as Manager... ⚠️ Logout element not found, manually navigating to login

testcase.name: Zoho Application Login Comprehensive Tests › 3. Login Negative Test Cases
testcase.system-out: ❌ STEP 3: Login Negative Test Cases Testing: Invalid Email with Valid Password ✅ Invalid email correctly prevented login Testing: Valid Email with Invalid Password ✅ Invalid password correctly prevented login Testing: Empty Email with Valid Password ✅ Empty email correctly prevented login Testing: Valid Email with Empty Password ✅ Empty password correctly prevented login Testing: Both Fields Empty ✅ Empty fields correctly prevented login Testing: Invalid Email Format ✅ Invalid email format correctly prevented login ✅ Login negative test cases completed
